snippet: A strong offensive first half for the Giants, highlighted by five catches by tight end Martellus Bennett, sputtered after the Redskins played more zone coverage and plugged a leaky run defense.
abstract: New York Giants tight end Martellus Bennett gives impressive first half performance as team comes up short in loss to Washington Redskins.
lead_paragraph: A strong offensive first half for the Giants, highlighted by five catches by tight end Martellus Bennett, sputtered after the Redskins played more zone coverage and plugged a leaky run defense.

headline.seo: Giants Offense Sputters in Second Half Against Redskins
headline.main: Impressive First Half for Bennett, but That’s It
headline.print_headline: Impressive First Half For Bennett, But That’s It
